JSON Web Tokens (JWT) Sample App

This app is a sample implementation of of token based authentication using the JWT standard.

No cookies are used - encoded tokens are stored locally and injected into HTTP headers for verification against the API.

Advantages include cross-origin resource sharing, CSRF protection, and reliability on native mobile apps.

Source is available on GitHub (Angular + Rails)


API Permissions
  • Link index is public
  • Adding links requires valid token
    • Register an account, or...
    • Login with:
      Email: user@example.com
      Password: password
  • Removing links requires admin-flagged token
    • Login with:
      Email: admin@example.com
      Password: password
